definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
Dengkou county in Bayan Nur 巴彥淖爾|巴彦淖尔[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3], Inner Mongolia
Dengkou county in Bayan Nur 巴彥淖爾|巴彦淖尔[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Around the veranda paved with stepping Ishidan, leading to the top.
sentences.chinese: 四周廊子鋪有踏磴，可通頂層。

sentences.english: She was sitting on the bottom step of the staircase.
sentences.chinese: 她正坐在最下面一磴樓梯上。

sentences.english: I think they should make some stiles for people to cross the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們應該建些梯磴好讓人們跨過牆去。

sentences.english: A short flight of steps led up to the door.
sentences.chinese: 上幾磴臺階就到了門口。

definition: to go up or down stairs step by step
to walk on tiptoe/to walk quietly/to tread (on)/to follow
